package
 
env

Documentation in literate-programming-style is available at: https://redhatinsights.github.io/insights-operator-utils/packages/env/env.html

 


import
 
(

	
"os"


)

GetEnv return value of environment variable if it exists, or fallback otherwise

 
func
 
GetEnv
(
key
,
 
fallback
 
string
)
 
string
 
{

	
if
 
value
,
 
ok
 
:=
 
os
.
LookupEnv
(
key
)
;
 
ok
 
{

		
return
 
value

	
}

	
return
 
fallback


}
